alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 2:02PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central La Paz, northeastern Yuma and Riverside Counties through 245 PM MST... At 202 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 21 miles west of Sundad to 9 miles southwest of Kofa Wildlife Refuge. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kofa Wildlife Refuge and Palm Canyon. This includes AZ Route 95 between mile markers 83 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
